page.title: 14RELIGION
page.content: We can tell what sort of{people}live around the rectangle we are covering, not just by their clothes, because {Catholics}wear the same as{Christians, but by{churches, chapels}and{mosques. If there are lots of churches then you can guess that there are a lot of Christians living there. If there is a big Mosque and it is a very{religious Mosque, you can tell it belongs to the Moslims. They also believe in a different religion. There are some Moslims who act like Christians. They can change their religion. The area we are covering has a lot of churches. The churches are very old, and they have a lot of {graveyards.}By looking at the {gravestones,}we think there must have been a lot of disease, because many children{died}when they were about one year old.
